chunk:
Antipodes Eve Bio-Retinol Line Reduction Serum

Brand: Antipodes

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, organic, Simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, organic, Caryodendron orinocense (cacay) seed oil, organic, jojoba oil/macadamia seed oil esters, Carthamus tinctorius (safflower) seed oil, squalane, Li

ed oil, squalane, Limnanthes alba (meadowfoam) seed oil, bakuchiol, Opuntia ficus-indica (prickly pear) seed oil, organic, Camellia oleifera (camellia) seed oil, organic, Terminalia ferdinandiana (kakadu plum) seed extract, Oenothera biennis (evening primrose) oil, organic, tocopherol (vitamin E), squalene, Aqua (water), phytosteryl macadamiate, ph

eryl macadamiate, phytosterols, parfum (geraniol, linalool, limonene, citronellol, citral)

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
